title: Caribou (Live from The Fallout Shelter)
lyrics:
I live cement
I hate this street
Give dirt to me
I bite lament
This human form
Where I was born

I now repent



Caribou (3x)



Repent

Re-pe-ent



Give me white

Ground to run

And foregone

Lets me knife

Knife me lets

I will get

What I like



Caribou (3x)



Repent

Rep-pent
